text: Fotini "Fofi" Gennimata ( ; 17 November 1964 â€“ 25 October 2021) was a Greek politician. She was president of the Panhellenic Socialist Movement (PASOK) from 2015 to 2021. She also was a member of the Hellenic Parliament between 2000 to 2002, a short time in 2012 and again from 2015 until her death. Gennimata was born in Athens, Greece. Gennimata was diagnosed with breast cancer in 2008. She died from the disease at a hospital in Athens on 25 October 2021, aged 56. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Politicians from Athens
title: Fofi Gennimata
